casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Levar Jamel ALLEN. No. 485PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of August 2006 by Defendant to Declare Matter Moot Based on Trial Court's Compliance with Mandate:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
